author: neilg
msg: Adding junit license to the repository.  All our jars should now be properly licensed.

author: neilg
msg: updating Grammar and XMLGrammarDescription interfaces consistent with recent discussions on the xerces-j-dev list.  Now Grammars have XMLGrammarDescription objects, and the getGrammarType method is only found in the XMLGrammarDescription interface.

author: twl
msg: Add license files for ASF licensed software

author: neilg
msg: took this class out of CachingParserPool since XMLGrammarCachingConfiguration now also needs it.  Also added a constructor to the SymbolTable class to allow its user to set the size--before hardcoded at 101.  For Grammar caching it makes sense to have this size a good deal larger.
